interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Meowingtons Hax 2K11
Review Date: 2013/03/16
Store: Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Meowingtons Hax 2k11 TORONTO,', 'filmed during the final stop of deadmau5 record-breaking Meowingtons Hax Tour takes you into the heart of the action with one of electronic music s biggest stars! Experience deadmau5 like never before, packing Toronto s Rogers Centre with nearly 20,000 screaming fans!Full of record breaking performances, deadmau5 Meowingtons Hax Tour made historic stops at Lollapalooza (where he co-headlined with Foo Fighters), NYC s Roseland Ballroom (where he played 6 consecutive sold out nights) and LA s Hollywood Palladium (where he played 4 consecutive sold out nights).', 'Meowingtons Hax 2k11 TORONTO,', 'brings you mind-blowing visuals, some of his biggest hits, live performances, and previously unreleased tracks.', 'Review', "The level of spectacle that the Canadian electronic musician/producer commands is not just beyond any other electronic act, it's beyond any other act period", 'Meowingtons Hax 2k11 TORONTO,', 'brings you mind-blowing visuals, some of his biggest hits, live performances, and previously unreleased tracks. --Spin']
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 5.53 x 0.44 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Release date': 'March 19, 2013', 'Actors': 'deadmau5', 'Studio': 'Ultra Records', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: I saw this on Netflix and wanted it right away. It looks and sounds even better on DVD. Nice live vocals and overall a collection of his better stuff. The visuals are stunning and the crows is crazy huge. Maybe 20,000?
Review Title: Good video and sound production.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Meowingtons Hax 2K11
Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure
['Product Description', 'Meowingtons Hax 2k11 TORONTO,', 'filmed during the final stop of deadmau5 record-breaking Meowingtons Hax Tour takes you into the heart of the action with one of electronic music s biggest stars! Experience deadmau5 like never before, packing Toronto s Rogers Centre with nearly 20,000 screaming fans!Full of record breaking performances, deadmau5 Meowingtons Hax Tour made historic stops at Lollapalooza (where he co-headlined with Foo Fighters), NYC s Roseland Ballroom (where he played 6 consecutive sold out nights) and LA s Hollywood Palladium (where he played 4 consecutive sold out nights).', 'Meowingtons Hax 2k11 TORONTO,', 'brings you mind-blowing visuals, some of his biggest hits, live performances, and previously unreleased tracks.', 'Review', "The level of spectacle that the Canadian electronic musician/producer commands is not just beyond any other electronic act, it's beyond any other act period", 'Meowingtons Hax 2k11 TORONTO,', 'brings you mind-blowing visuals, some of his biggest hits, live performances, and previously unreleased tracks. --Spin']
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 5.53 x 0.44 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Release date': 'March 19, 2013', 'Actors': 'deadmau5', 'Studio': 'Ultra Records', 'Number of discs': '1'}
I saw this on Netflix and wanted it right away. It looks and sounds even better on DVD. Nice live vocals and overall a collection of his better stuff. The visuals are stunning and the crows is crazy huge. Maybe 20,000?
Good video and sound production.
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Music Enthusiast:** Strong interest in electronic music, particularly live performances, and iconic artists.
- **Visual Appeal:** Prefers high-quality visuals in media, as noted by enjoyment of stunning visuals and production quality.
- **Format Preference:** Values physical media (DVD) for improved viewing and sound experience compared to streaming services.
- **Live Experiences:** Shows appreciation for large-scale live events and audience engagement, indicating a preference for shared experiences in music.
- **Positive Reception:** Tends to have a positive outlook on experiences and products, as demonstrated by high ratings and enthusiastic reviews.
- **Genre Appreciation:** Enjoys action and adventure genres, reflecting a broader interest in entertainment that evokes strong emotions and excitement. 

Overall, this user prioritizes high-quality audio-visual experiences, especially within the realm of electronic music and live performances, while favoring tangible formats over digital streaming.
